subject: Re: Information you requested
body:
FINDTHATMONEY.com 



Find 
                              That Money helps in developing e-market campaigns 
                              and establishing their clients companies in the 
                              financial markets. We ensure that the key investor 
                              and media audiences who should know about our 
                              client companies receive all the information they 
                              need to analyze their potential.


We 
                              specialize in providing small-cap companies with 
                              distributed corporate email hosting services. Our 
                              website has two major features that enable you to 
                              effectively connect with and broadcast information 
                              to your business audience. Post 
                              Ad is our community messaging 
                              system and eBlast 
                              is the fastest high-volume eMail 
                              delivery infrastructure in the market place today.
Our 
                              mission is to provide effective solutions that 
                              help our clients bridge the contact and 
                              communication gap between them and their investor. 
                              Our services assist with creating new 
                              opportunities and building and extending new 
                              networks.


We 
                              are CAN-SPAM compliant and are privately held and 
                              headquartered in Vancouver, British Columbia.






















We support responsible and ethical email   marketing practices. Please know that we respect your right to be purged from   this marketing campaign. Removal from this email distribution list is   automatically enforced by our email delivery system. Please 
                  click here  to unsubscribe from future e-mailings

















	  Cossroads IR3267 W Broadway - Vancouver, BC V5Y 1P4 CA
